Class APSR

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsr.model.APSR

    IPSR, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MemorylessState, TPSR

    public abstract class APSR
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, IPSR
    Top-level class for learning and maintaining a PSR.

    William Hamilton
